billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Requires division of housing and community renewal and owners under their purview to provide building service registration forms in addition to lease renewal information
summary: Requires division of housing and community renewal and owners under their purview to provide building service registration forms in addition to lease renewal information.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1263

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                    January 6, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by Sens. ADDABBO, PARKER, PERALTA, SQUADRON -- read twice and
         ordered  printed, and when printed to be committed to the Committee on
         Housing, Construction and Community Development

       AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of  nineteen  seven-
         ty-four  in  relation to requiring building services registration form
         RR-3(i), found in 9 NYCRR 2528.2, be  included  in  the  copy  of  the
         renewal lease provided to the tenant

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision c of section 10 of section 4 of chapter 576  of
    2  the  laws  of  1974, constituting the emergency tenant protection act of
    3  nineteen seventy-four, as added by chapter 439 of the laws of  1984,  is
    4  amended to read as follows:
    5    c.  Each  owner of premises subject to this act AND OWNERS OF PREMISES
    6  IN CITIES HAVING A POPULATION OF ONE MILLION OR MORE  shall  furnish  to
    7  each tenant signing a new or renewal lease, a copy of the fully executed
    8  new  or  renewal lease bearing the signatures of owner and tenant [and],
    9  the beginning and ending dates of the lease term AND  BUILDING  SERVICES
   10  REGISTRATION  FORM  RR-3(I)  FOUND IN 9 NYCRR 2528.2, within thirty days
   11  from the owner's receipt of the new  or  renewal  lease  signed  by  the
   12  tenant.
   13    S  2.  This  act shall take effect immediately; provided, however that
   14  the amendments to subdivision c of section 10 of  the  emergency  tenant
   15  protection  act of nineteen seventy-four made by section one of this act
   16  shall expire on the same date as such act expires and shall  not  affect
   17  the  expiration  of such act as provided in section 17 of chapter 576 of
   18  the laws of 1974, as amended.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01392-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four in relation to requiring building services registration form RR-3(i), found in 9 NYCRR 2528.2, be included in the copy of the renewal lease provided to the tenant
